knimeNode.name: Gradient Boosted Trees Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Classifies data using a Gradient Boosted Trees model.

fullDescription.intro: Classifies data using a Gradient Boosted Trees model. The implementation follows the algorithms described in "Greedy Function Approximation: A Gradient Boosting Machine" by Jerome H. Friedman (1999)". For more information you can also take a look at this .
fullDescription.option: Check this option if you want to use a custom name for the column containing the prediction
Name of the output column containing the prediction.
Appends a column that contains information on how the certain the model is about its prediction.
Appends for each possible class a column containing the probability that the given row is an element of this class
Allows to add a suffix for the class probability columns.

ports.inPort: Gradient Boosted Trees model as produced by the Gradient Boosted Trees Learner node.
